listing.name: DotZero AI Tools
listing.shortDescription: MCP servers and skills for DotZero manufacturing systems
listing.longDescription: A comprehensive collection of MCP servers and Claude Code skills for integrating with DotZero manufacturing systems. Includes 7 MCP servers with 217 tools covering Work Order management, SPC quality control, Equipment monitoring, Device Topology, and OEE analysis. Offers both native MCP integration and cross-platform REST API skills for any AI agent.

features.title: Dual-Track Architecture
